comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 723
formula: E.g.f.: log(-1/(-1+x))^2*x^3.Recurrence: {a(1)=0, a(2)=0, a(4)=0, a(3)=0, a(5)=120, (n^4-7*n^2-3*n^3+15*n+18)*a(n) + (8*n-2*n^3+5*n^2-20)*a(n+1) + (-3*n+n^2+2)*a(n+2)}.a(n) ~ 2*(n-1)! * (log(n) + gamma), where gamma is Euler-Mascheroni constant (A001620). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name, using e.g.f., by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
